mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room_info ( aid, riroom_type, riroom, riservice, risize, riminper, rimaxper, ripeak, risemipeak, rioff ) VALUES ( #{aId}, #{riroomtype}, #{riroom}, #{riservice}, #{risize}, #{riminper}, #{rimaxper}, #{ripeak}, #{risemipeak}, #{rioff} )
